Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lix0Utu4g8mQ0ZtI]{Divine Ally} (blade), tenets of evil

Your blade ally shares your lust for the blood of good creatures. Select one enemy you can see. Until the start of your next turn, your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra [[/r 4 #evil]] evil damage, increasing to [[/r 6 #evil]] if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemyâ€™s next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.
